editions.effect: [Class Bonus] **On Attack:** You may banish three fire element cards from your graveyard. If you do, CARDNAME gains "%Whenever%If% this attack would deal damage, it deals double that damage instead."

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: 'Whenever this attack would deal damage, it deals double that damage instead.' -> 'If this attack would deal damage, it deals double that damage instead.'
If Rending Flames deals double damage, it doubles all other sources of combat damage as well. This includes but is not limited to weapon attack and temporary attack bonus effects.

effect_html: Class Bonus On Attack: You may banish three fire element cards from your graveyard. If you do, Rending Flames gains "If this attack would deal damage, it deals double that damage instead."
